disclaimerModalTitle.zh: 免责声明和数据隐私政策

disclaimer.en: This tool may use incorrect or outdated requirements. The author of this tool, and the tool itself, are not responsible for any losses caused by its use. Users who utilize this tool are liable for checking the updated requirements on government websites and assume full responsibility for the photos they create using this tool. By clicking "Agree" and continue, you confirm your agreement with this disclaimer.
disclaimer.zh: 此工具可能使用不正确或过时的要求。该工具的作者以及工具本身不对其使用造成的任何损失负责。使用此工具的用户有责任检查政府网站上的最新要求，并对使用此工具创建的照片承担全部责任。通过点击“同意”并继续，表示您确认您同意此免责声明。

disclaimer2.en: Your photo will be processed locally inside your browser. NO photos will be uploaded to any server. The only data shared are your access activities to this website, which are used for Google website analytics. By clicking 'Agree' and continuing, you confirm your agreement with this policy.
disclaimer2.zh: 您的照片将在本地浏览器内进行处理，*不会*上传到任何服务器。唯一共享的数据是您对本网站的访问活动，用于Google网站分析。点击'同意'并继续，即表示您确认同意此政策。

buyMeACoffeeButton.en: Like it? Buy me a coffee!

buyMeACoffeeWords.en: Anything is appreciated! A thank-you letter sent to hjt486@gmail.com would make my day! I'm glad I can help.
buyMeACoffeeWords.zh: 任何心意都很感激！哪怕是一封发到 hjt486@gmail.com 的感谢信，能帮到你是我最开心的事情！
